name: sample-wasi-http-js
description: Sample project demonstratingu JS project targeting WASI http
author: Tomasz Andrzejak

scripts.build: npm run bundle && componentize-js --aot --wit wit -o dist/$npm_package_name.wasm dist/bundle.js
scripts.build:debug: npm run bundle && componentize-js --use-debug-build --runtime-args "--enable-script-debugging" --wit wit-debug -o dist/$npm_package_name.wasm dist/bundle.js
